prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with striking blue and green accents, wearing a knightly armor.
Imagine a psychic-type Pokemon that uses its blades to battle, showcasing elegance and power.
Show me a Pokemon with a humanoid shape and sharp features, blending grace and combat skill.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, characterized by a blue body and green details.
Generate a fighting-type creature with an athletic build and a fierce expression, perfect for battles.
Give me a Pokemon that combines psychic abilities with a warrior's stance, adorned with elegant colors.
Make a Pokemon that represents courage and strength, featuring distinctive blades and a blue-green palette.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Melee focused with speed and agility
